name: Sonic Shutdown
text: When a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect is activated while you control a "Sonic" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. While this card is in your GY, if a "Sonic Duck" leaves the field: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Sonic Shutdown" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
